name: Dr. Radcliffe's Mathematical Scrapbook
body:
### Welcome

I plan to use this site to develop and host educational JavaScript applets in mathematics. You may also be interested in my [GeoGebra applets](http://analemma.wikispaces.com/).

### Tutoring Available

I am have a Ph.D. in mathematics, and I have many years of experience teaching college students. If you need help with mathematics at any level, please contact me at dave@gotmath.com.

### Other ways to connect

* Blog: http://mathblag.wordpress.com/
* Twitter: https://twitter.com/daveinstpaul
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/david.radcliffe
* LinkedIn: http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=77265189

If you send me a connection request on Facebook or LinkedIn, but I don't know you personally, please tell me a little bit about yourself.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
